Statistically in EU study - 60% of 9-16 year olds have online profiles - we as educators have a responsibility to support this for safety and privacy as needed, not reject or ban it (I think) #slavconf

I fear my level of digital well being may be a little low - I work online, I socialise online, I start and end the day online..... hmmm...but I do live by the beach and walk to absorb negative ions...good? #slavconf
I really like the focus on digital wellbeing Dr Ross Todd is sharing - going beyond digital citizenship & digital literacy #slavconf #ETL523
Dr Ross Todd states - Safety online must be balanced with children's rights, pleasures, opportunities including opportunities for risk-taking - #ETL523 consider this with your DC modules #slavconf
We need to break out ot the anxiety and moral panic over impact of technology on childhood innocence, says Ross Todd #slavconf and reject over-celbratory notions of digital natives #ETL523

Recommended research - Listen to the voices - sample size 25,142 across 25 European countries. Good basis for developing our own thinking #slavconf https://books.google.com.au/books/about/Children_Risk_and_Safety_on_the_Internet.html?id=R__hfWbE3DwC&printsec=frontcover&source=kp_read_button&redir_esc=y…
